Articles.Content:
I saw that FAR had updated so i decided to play ksp again but my game keeps crashing on the loading screen, here is the link to the log files https://www.dropbox.com/s/0xkbec96zei3704/2017-05-29_141800.7z?dl=0

 

New logs with correct mod: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ydrygubl9vwcpic/2017-05-29_183704.7z?dl=0

Edited May 29, 2017 by GabrielFW
Link for new logs with same problem but fixed a wrong version of a mod

FAR has been updated to 1.2.2, and works very well.

KSP updated to 1.3.0 a day or two after that (It's almost like they were waiting for FAR to update).

Make sure your KSP version is 1.2.2 and you should be good to go.
Yeah, I have the 1.2.2 version but im trying to use a lot of other mods besides FAR
